alert.note: Alert for Grant; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:40PM EDT until April 05 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Grant County in northern Kentucky... Owen County in northern Kentucky... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 540 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Owenton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Dry Ridge, Owenton, Corinth, Monterey, Gratz, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Beechwood, Harmony, Cherry Grove, Long Ridge, Williamstown Lake, Natlee, Twin Bridges, Squiresville, Keefer, Camp Northward, Needmore and New Columbus. This includes I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 144 and 158. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
